title: Federal system allows reg. govts. to have police

content.question: Which of the following is a difference between federal and unitary systems of government?

choices.label: In a unitary system, there are no subnational governments
In a unitary system, subnational governments may declare their independence.
In a federal system, subnational governments cannot spend money without national permission.
In a federal system, subnational governments may maintain their own police forces and militias.
In a federal system, subnational governments may conclude treaties with other countries.

content.answer: In a federal system, subnational governments may maintain their own police forces and militias.
